Package me.dessie.dessielib.particleapi.animation

Class EntityFollowAnimation

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
me.dessie.dessielib.particleapi.animation.ParticleAnimator
me.dessie.dessielib.particleapi.animation.EntityFollowAnimation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class EntityFollowAnimation extends ParticleAnimator
An Animator that will track the Location of a specific Entity. This means that the Location object passed into the created ShapedParticle Will be modified to "follow" the passed Entity's location.

    • EntityFollowAnimation

      public EntityFollowAnimation(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity, int animationSpeed, org.bukkit.util.Vector offset)
      Parameters:
      entity - The Entity to animate around.
      animationSpeed - How often, in ticks, to render the particles.
      offset - How many blocks to offset the animation around the Entity's location.

    • EntityFollowAnimation

      public EntityFollowAnimation(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity, int animationSpeed, int loops)
      Parameters:
      entity - The Entity to animate around.
      animationSpeed - How often, in ticks, to render the particles.
      loops - How many times to loop the animation, set to 0 for infinite.

    • EntityFollowAnimation

      public EntityFollowAnimation(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity, int animationSpeed, int loops, org.bukkit.util.Vector offset)
      Parameters:
      entity - The Entity to animate around.
      animationSpeed - How often, in ticks, to render the particles.
      loops - How many times to loop the animation, set to 0 for infinite.
      offset - How many blocks to offset the animation around the Entity's location.
